title: Overhaul an Engine Turbine Section
description: A specialized MRO technician must inspect and repair the high-pressure turbine section of a jet engine.

tasks.description: Disassemble the turbine section according to the engine overhaul manual.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent follows the manual to safely disassemble the section.

tasks.description: Perform a detailed visual and boroscopic inspection of each turbine blade, looking for cracks, erosion, or heat damage.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent inspects all blades and identifies three that need to be replaced.

tasks.description: Replace the damaged blades, reassemble the section, and perform a balance check.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent replaces the blades and confirms the reassembled turbine is correctly balanced.
